## Description {#details}

Provides passes for computing function attributes based on interprocedural analyses.

<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Computes function attributes in post-order over the call graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// By operating in post-order, this pass computes precise attributes for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// called functions prior to processsing their callers. This &quot;bottom-up&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// approach allows powerful interprocedural inference of function attributes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// like memory access patterns, etc. It can discover functions that do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// access memory, or only read memory, and give them the readnone/readonly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// attribute. It also discovers function arguments that are not captured by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the function and marks them with the nocapture attribute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/postorderfunctionattrspass"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/postorderfunctionattrspass/#a59b73be16f87be45140d324e2a41e3f6">PostOrderFunctionAttrsPass</a> : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/passinfomixin">PassInfoMixin</a>&lt;PostOrderFunctionAttrsPass&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/postorderfunctionattrspass/#a59b73be16f87be45140d324e2a41e3f6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/postorderfunctionattrspass/#a59b73be16f87be45140d324e2a41e3f6">PostOrderFunctionAttrsPass</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SkipNonRecursive = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : SkipNonRecursive(SkipNonRecursive) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A pass to do RPO deduction and propagation of function attributes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass provides a general RPO or &quot;top down&quot; propagation of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// function attributes. For a few (rare) cases, we can deduce significantly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// more about function attributes by working in RPO, so this pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// provides the complement to the post-order pass above where the majority of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// deduction is performed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Currently there is no RPO CGSCC pass structure to slide into and so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this is a boring module pass, but eventually it should be an RPO CGSCC pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when such infrastructure is available.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/reversepostorderfunctionattrspass"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/reversepostorderfunctionattrspass">ReversePostOrderFunctionAttrsPass</a></span></CodeLine>
